text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: In a quiet village, on Halloween night, when the boundary between our world and the spirit realm thins, mischievous spirits emerge. And at that moment, the [Bard] encountered…

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: … The [Demon]. It spoke of a forbidden existence, a tale of a lonely [Mechanical Doll] drifting aimlessly, devoid of purpose.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: A lonely, mechanical doll……

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: An entity born from the ego of one who dared to challenge the gods — the [Creator]… It's like an "android", but for our story, let's say a "monster".

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: The [Demon] whispered to it; "Do you not desire to know your raison d'être?" And thus, the tragic journey of the [Mechanical Doll], seeking closure, commences!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: An epic tale that transcends hell, purgatory, and the highest heavens… A story of "farewells"!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: The most beautiful and poignant aspect of our world… It is none other than the act of parting. A final moment like the highs of X.Y.Z⁽ᵃˡᶜᵒʰᵒˡ⁾ ――

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: With this concept, we will craft an incredible script! HA-HAHA!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (An android existing without purpose, merely in solitude. No mission, just a heart-wrenching conclusion……)

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Hey buddy, did ya take a likin' to that tale?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: OK! I'd reckon — you should be the star of our show!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ! Me…… as the star of the show?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: That's right! Gimlet, are you on board with this?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: … O' foreboding figure of destiny. You shall become a Muse of Tragedy⁽ᵗᵃᵏᵉ ᶜᵉⁿᵗᵉʳ ˢᵗᵃᵍᵉ⁾… Perhaps this, too, is fate.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: My heart is resolute — Kris S, I entrust this destiny to you. Like bidding farewell to King Lear, lost in the wilderness, we shall enact this sorrowful parting.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: …… Yes, ma'am. I accept the mission.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Fyuuh♪ Now, how 'bout we cast the other roles!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ―― Our cast is hereby in place. Let's dive straight into rehearsals!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Let's go… hold on a sec. I'm not entirely sold on my role.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Why the heck am I the "demon"!

text_block_list.name: Fine & Tap
text_block_list.text: Because it suits you perfectly!!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: … According to Gimlet, the devil's lines are freaking endless. Do you really think I'm that enthusiastic? Huh?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Well, Kris S is taking the lead, isn't she? As the director, I need to manage some behind-the-scenes matters and thus assume smaller roles.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Gimlet mentioned wanting to be the doll's creator while also helping with the script. That leaves the demon and the bard…

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: I'm the bard for sure, which leaves you as the devil!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Come on, Shakur! Or would you rather read aloud one of Gimlet's poems?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: … Ugh. That weeb's working on the script right now isn't she? Tell her to make it concise!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Sure thing♪ Regarding rehearsals… We're all quite new to this, aren't we? That's precisely why I've enlisted a professional to assist us! Let's give it our best effort!

text_block_list.name: Drama Coach
text_block_list.text: ―― Alright, let's start by working on everyone's pronunciations. We'll begin with the "Uirou-uri" I taught you earlier… Ms. Tap, you may go first!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: As the master, I declare, in this fine affair, known to many, I'm aware, that you're well aware of the care ――

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Brew the tea, make it swift; the tea brew's our drift. With a bamboo whisk's uplift, twirl to make our tea swift.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: You're all doing so well! I understand these lessons can be quite challenging when we're not accustomed to them, but with everyone's collective effort, we'll surely excel!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Ya ain't gonna join us?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I'll be practicing on my own! I've got director duties to attend to.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Set design, costumes, lighting…… coordinating with the organizing committee… I'd like things to move forward swiftly!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: I see. Well then, you've got dependable friends right here, don't ya?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I know you're awfully dependable, but everyone's giving their full attention to the lessons, so it's all good! Just leave it to the director!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Hmm…… ―― That's it!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: … Now, all that's left is arranging the classroom, bringing in the equipment, and shopping for what we're lacking… As well as informing the teachers ――

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Well, Fine, it's 'bout time you put me to good use, ain't it? ―― Ya need some buddies to lend a hand!
